name: TaxiForRent.com
overview:
TaxiForRent.com was started in September 2009 with the aim of providing the Indian car rental customer the best prices combined with top quality services. Three years since its modest start, the company has now completed more than 6,000 trips worth Rs 157 lakhs. The company offers its services in 38 locations across the country today & is continuously looking to expand.

TaxiForRent.com provides car rental solutions to individual customers, corporate customers & travel agents. As of today, it provides dedicated car rentals for both local & outstation trips; it does not provide metered taxi or self drives. However within a period of 2 years, it would include these services across the cities.

TaxiForRent.com aims to be the most preferred brand in the car rental space in India & beyond by providing the best-in-class experience for the customers at extremely competitive prices.

TaxiForRent.com firmly believes in the core values of doing business with honesty, integrity, fair pricing and unwavering commitment to customer service. With time, effort & dedication, we envision TaxiForRent.com to be the leading customer-driven car rental company in India. The goal is not to be biggest but the best car rental company in the country. The criteria of “Customer Satisfaction” ranks highest among our priorities.
